==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial; This section is based on the highest-difficulty version available in the event. Some information may be inaccurate in lower difficulties.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = ATK Bonus
|desc_1 = The Crackling Thunder Manifestation has a '''25%''' [[ATK]] Bonus at all times. This stacks additively with other sources of ATK% buffs or debuffs.
}}

===While Not Enraged===
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Lightning Probes (Enhanced)
|file_1 = Crackling Thunder Manifestation Strike Probes (Enhanced)
|desc_1 = Flies into the air and releases 3 Lightning Strike Probes around the arena that pulse intermittently, dealing '''16.6% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on landing. Upon entering the range of a Lightning Strike Probe while it is pulsing, the Thunder Manifestation continuously gains [[Rage]], but will lose the accumulated Rage if the player exits the range. The Lightning Strike Probes are {{Electro}} objects that can be destroyed using the appropriate [[Elemental Reaction]]s.
{{Elemental Shield Data|Electro|3|noec=1}}

|name_2 = Close-Range Detection
|desc_2 = Releases a shockwave below itself, dealing '''83.3% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. If this attack hits the player, the Crackling Thunder Manifestation will immediately become enraged.
|strat_2 = Exit its range or utilize [[dash]] [[i-frames]] to avoid being hit.

|name_3 = Slicing Storm (Enhanced)
|desc_3 = Summons 2 replicas of itself. The Crackling Thunder Manifestation and its replicas curl up and rotates their wings, spinning forward and rapidly slicing targets in its way, rapidly dealing '''27.7% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. If this attack hits the player, the Crackling Thunder Manifestation will immediately become enraged.

|name_4 = Walls of Lightning (Enhanced)
|desc_4 = Summons 4 walls of lightning which close in towards the center of the arena, rapidly dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on contact. If this attack hits the player, the Crackling Thunder Manifestation will immediately become enraged.
|strat_4 = The walls can be dashed through without taking DMG.

|name_5 = Strifeful Lightning (Enhanced)
|file_5 = Crackling Thunder Manifestation Furious Thunderbolts (Enhanced)
|desc_5 = Flies up and calls forth 2 waves of lightning bolts to descend upon the target. The bolts will strike in a circular area, and for every wave it will strike 8 times, each dealing '''43.3% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. If this attack hits the player, the Crackling Thunder Manifestation will immediately become enraged.
|strat_5 = Stay near the center of the arena to be completely safe from this attack.

|name_6 = Thundering Shackles
|file_6 = Crackling Thunder Manifestation Thunder Cage
|desc_6 = Unleashing 4 electrical prisons that travel in random directions across the arena, dealing '''27.7% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DoT}} if touched or inside of. If this attack hits the player, the Crackling Thunder Manifestation will immediately become enraged.
|strat_6 = Stay near the center of the arena to be completely safe from this attack.
}}

===While Enraged===
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Torrential Rainfall
|desc_1 = Immediately after locking onto the player, sends out waves of rapid lightning strikes in all directions and removes all Strike Probes and Thunder Cages present on the field. Each lightning strike deals '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_2 = Slicing Storm (Enhanced)
|desc_2 = Summons 2 replicas of itself. The Crackling Thunder Manifestation and its replicas curl up and rotates their wings, spinning forward and rapidly slicing targets in its way, rapidly dealing '''27.7% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_3 = Thunderous Wingslash
|file_3 = Crackling Thunder Manifestation Smack
|desc_3 = If the player attacks the Crackling Thunder Manifestation in melee range, quickly raises one of its wings and smacks at its target, dealing '''55.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_4 = Walls of Lightning
|desc_4 = Summons two walls of lightning to the target's sides which quickly close in on them, rapidly dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} on contact.

|name_5 = Sundering Plumes (Enhanced)
|desc_5 = Summons 2 replicas of itself. The Crackling Thunder Manifestation and its replicas each forms five sets of electric feathers, and releases them against the target, each dealing '''28.8% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_6 = Dive Bomb
|desc_6 = Flies and repositions itself near the border of the arena, then it dives forward in a straight line twice, dealing '''83.3% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_7 = Strifeful Lightning
|file_7 = Crackling Thunder Manifestation Furious Thunderbolts
|desc_7 = Flies up and calls forth 3 waves of lightning bolts to descend upon the target. The bolts will strike in a circular area, and for every wave it will strike 3 times, each dealing '''43.3% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.

|name_8 = Thundering Shackles
|file_8 = Crackling Thunder Manifestation Homing Thunder Cage
|desc_8 = Charges up and marks the target with a thunder circle for a short duration. The circle will then stop and activate, unleashing an electrical prison that homes in on the target, dealing '''27.7% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DoT}} if touched or inside of.
}}
